remarks: Contraposition law for polarity.  Remark in [Holland95] p. 223. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2polss.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2polss.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
polcon3N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ Y C_ A /\ X C_ Y ) -> ( ._|_ ` Y ) C_ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) $.
